plot: On the day of his wedding Kevin confronts his brother Landon, to ask for permission to marry his ex-wife, but learns the circumstances surrounding his brother's estrangement were far more fantastic than he had been led to believe.
title: Remora
plot_es: On the day of his wedding Kevin confronts his brother Landon, to ask for permission to marry his ex-wife, but learns the circumstances surrounding his brother's estrangement were far more fantastic than he had been led to believe.
plot_en: On the day of his wedding Kevin confronts his brother Landon, to ask for permission to marry his ex-wife, but learns the circumstances surrounding his brother's estrangement were far more fantastic than he had been led to believe.
